Package io.github.jonloucks.metalog.api

Interface Publisher

All Superinterfaces:
Filterable, Predicate<Meta>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Console, Metalog
public interface Publisher extends Filterable
Responsible for publishing log messages

  • Method Details

    • publish

      default void publish(Log log)
      Publish a log message with the default meta information. This is minimal log message, there will be no timestamp, thread info, etc.
      Parameters:
      log - the log message to publish

    • publish

      void publish(Log log, Meta meta)
      Publish a log message and it's included meta information.
      Parameters:
      log - the log message to publish
      meta - the meta information for the given log

    • publish

      void publish(Log log, Consumer<Meta.Builder<?>> builderConsumer)
      Publish a log message with the meta initialized in a callback
      Parameters:
      log - the log message to publish
      builderConsumer - the callback to accept the Meta.Builder
